reviews.review_msg: Pretty much exactly what the 2nd poster before me wrote. He's a nice prof and has interesting and creative lectures but can mark a little harsh. He also tends to go off topic and ramble but his class is very enjoyable.

Wow.  I love Geoff.  I definately look forward to taking more classes with him! I took Political Economic Geo. Its the best! if you like [hil and you are interested in econ but don't know very much about either, AND you want to know about geo then this is an awesome course.
Very easy to follow and listen to.  Well carried lectures. Exam were easy!!! Would take another class with him for sure!
